revision.comment: unnecessary on disambiguation pages; is built into the template
revision.text:
'''Abila''', also spelled '''Abyla''', is the name of several places:
==Towns== * [[Abila (Decapolis)|Abila in Decapolis]], also called Seleucia, northeast of present-day Irbid in Jordan * [[Abila Lysaniou]], capital of ancient Abilene, northwest of present-day Damascus in Syria * [[Abila (Peraea)|Abila in Peraea]], northeast of the northern shore of the Dead Sea, in present-day Jordan * Abila in Hispania, the Latin name of [[√Åvila, Spain]] * [[Abila (Mauretania)|Abila in Mauretania]], a city on the African side of the Strait of Gibraltar
==Mountains== * Mt. Abila, the southern of the [[Pillars of Hercules]] near present-day Ceuta, probably [[Jebel Musa (Morocco)|Jebel Musa]] but possibly [[Monte Hacho]]
==Other== * [[Abila (grasshopper)|''Abila'', a genus of grasshoppers]]
==See also== * [[Abilene (biblical)|Abilene in the Bible]]
{{geodis}}
